headline: KKR Reportedly Nears Buyout of Dayao
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. is close to acquiring an 85% stake in Chinese soda maker Dayao, according to people familiar with the situation. Dayao?s founders are likely to retain a minority stake, the people...

headline: Oasis Co., Ltd. acquired TMON Inc. for KRW 18 billion.
summary: Oasis Co., Ltd. acquired TMON Inc. for KRW 18 billion on June 23, 2025. TMON filed for court receivership in July last year following widespread delays in payments to vendors using its...
